Okay where do i start? Dont f*****ng play matchmaking. You'll get toxic russians in your team all the time and most likely cheaters in enemy team. Servers are slower than my grandma on stairs and the community ( devs too ) suck, since no one seems to care about having fun in this game at all. It's just about winning and doing as the russian in your team says or he starts to AFK/troll and wont play anymore. If you actually want to enjoy playing this game, you either go Faceit or aim_botz. My hours tell you that i know what im talking about.

Hiko missed his spray.

[url=https://imgur.com/a/bSVI0]Images with explanations[/url]

Summary:

Shots 1-5: Clearly missed.
Shots 6-9: Missed due to recoil (bad spray control).
Shots 10-11: Very close, but recoil and inaccuracy make these reasonable misses.
Shot 12: Likely didn't actually fire because Hiko was already dead.
